languages.text: "Я с удовольствием разделал двух из троих, пришедших за мной, и пошел по следу отпущенного, чтобы поглядеть, откуда лезут эти вредители".
"I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me. I then followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."
languages.original_text: "Я с удовольствием разделал двух из троих, пришедших за мной, и пошел по следу отпущенного, чтобы поглядеть, откуда лезут эти вредители".

traits.locale_text: "I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me, and followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."
"I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me, and followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."

"I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me. I then followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."

languages.text: «Tuve el placer de desgarrar a dos de los tres que vinieron a por mí. Después, seguí el rastro del que dejé escapar para ver de dónde salían esas alimañas».
languages.original_text: "I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me. I then followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."

traits.locale_text: «Tuve el placer de desgarrar a dos de los tres que vinieron a por mí. Después, seguí el rastro del que dejé escapar para ver de dónde salían esas alimañas».

languages.text: 「私を追ってきた3人のうち2人を切って遊んでやったよ。その後、私が逃がした1人の足跡をたどって、この害虫らがどこから来たのか確かめたんだ」
languages.original_text: "I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me. I then followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."

traits.locale_text: 「私を追ってきた3人のうち2人を切って遊んでやったよ。その後、私が逃がした1人の足跡をたどって、この害虫らがどこから来たのか確かめたんだ」

languages.text: “刚刚有三个人打算杀我，我把其中两个切成了肉泥，把另外那个放走了。随后，我跟踪被我放走的那个人，看看这些害虫到底是从哪来的。”
languages.original_text: "I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me. I then followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."

traits.locale_text: “刚刚有三个人打算杀我，我把其中两个切成了肉泥，把另外那个放走了。随后，我跟踪被我放走的那个人，看看这些害虫到底是从哪来的。”

languages.text: "Ich hatte das Vergnügen, zwei meiner drei Verfolger aufzuschlitzen. Dann folgte ich der Spur des einen, den ich laufen gelassen hatte, um zu sehen, wo das Ungeziefer herkam."
languages.original_text: "I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me. I then followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte das Vergnügen, zwei meiner drei Verfolger aufzuschlitzen. Dann folgte ich der Spur des einen, den ich laufen gelassen hatte, um zu sehen, wo das Ungeziefer herkam."

languages.text: « Je me suis fait un plaisir d'abattre deux des trois fanatiques venus me chercher. Ensuite, il m'a suffi de suivre à la trace celui que j'avais épargné pour savoir de quel trou sordide sortaient ces cloportes. »
languages.original_text: "I had the pleasure of cutting up two of the three that came after me. I then followed the trail of the one I let go to see where these pests were coming from."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis fait un plaisir d'abattre deux des trois fanatiques venus me chercher. Ensuite, il m'a suffi de suivre à la trace celui que j'avais épargné pour savoir de quel trou sordide sortaient ces cloportes. »
